title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Spain where Percentage of population is 24.0.
The lowest category is found at Germany where Percentage of population is 10.0.
The highest value at Spain is almost 2.4 times larger than the minimum value of Germany.
